item.title: 法国奥拉诺公司在蒙古开发铀矿取得进展
item.description: 法国国有控股矿业公司奥拉诺公司（Orano SA）正在蒙古开发一个拖延已久、耗资数十亿美元的铀矿项目，该公司表示，该项目将于 2030 年开始生产核燃料。【原文：A long-delayed, multi-billion dollar uranium project in Mongolia under development by French state-controlled miner Orano SA could start producing the nuclear fuel by 2030, the company said.】

item.title: 对冲基金在日元出现 15 年来最大跌幅前买入日元
item.description: 就在日本新首相的鸽派言论和强劲的美国就业报告帮助日本货币创下 2009 年底以来最糟糕的一周之前，对冲基金转而看涨日元。【原文：Hedge funds turned bullish on the yen just before dovish comments by Japan’s new prime minister and a robust US jobs report helped spark the worst week for Japan’s currency since late 2009.】

item.title: 高盛称暴涨的中国股市可能再涨 20
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.）将其对中国股市的看涨评级上调至增持，加入了吹捧中国政府刺激经济举措积极影响的乐观主义阵营。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. upgraded its call on Chinese stocks to overweight, as it joined a camp of optimists that are touting the positive impact of Beijing’s stimulus blitz.】

item.title: 诺林丘金银行计划发行亏损以来的首支美元债券
item.description: 日本 Norinchukin 银行为其首次潜在的基准美元债券销售聘请了投资银行，因为这家农业贷款公司在 6 月份表示，由于债券损失，预计本财年将出现约 1.5 万亿日元（101 亿美元）的净亏损。【原文：Japan’s Norinchukin Bank hired investment banks for its first potential benchmark dollar bond sale since the agricultural lender said in June that it expects to report a net loss of about ¥1.5 trillion ($10.1 billion) in the current fiscal year due to bond losses.】

item.title: 印度 200 亿美元的交易管道吸引基金投资 PE 持有的股份
item.description: 二级投资者抢购私募股权基金所持资产的股份，他们正在印度加大投资力度，以从价值高达 200 亿美元的交易管道中分得一杯羹。【原文：Secondary investors, who snap up stakes in assets held by private equity funds, are ramping up in India to grab a piece of a deal pipeline worth as much as $20 billion.】

item.title: 沙特基金表示愿意增持任天堂股份后任天堂股价大涨
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金的一位高级管理人员告诉当地媒体，该基金正在考虑增持日本游戏公司的股份，任天堂公司的股价因此上涨了 3.9%。【原文：Nintendo Co.’s shares rose as much as 3.9% after a senior executive with Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund told local media it’s considering increasing its stakes in Japanese game companies.】

item.title: 债券多头押注印度央行转向鸽派以延续涨势
item.description: 印度的债券多头乐观地认为，印度央行将放宽鹰派货币政策立场，这可能为下一轮反弹奠定基础。【原文：India’s bond bulls are optimistic the central bank will ease its hawkish monetary policy stance, potentially setting the stage for the next leg of a rally.】

item.title: 投资者权衡中东紧张局势和利率前景，黄金保持稳定
item.description: 黄金持稳，原因是交易商权衡了一触即发的中东紧张局势和强于预期的美国就业报告，后者浇灭了美联储今年积极降息的希望。【原文：Gold held steady as traders weighed simmering Middle East tensions against a stronger-than-expected US jobs report that doused hopes for aggressive rate cuts by the Federal Reserve this year.】

item.title: 魁北克养老基金表示准备在 7-Eleven 争夺战中支持 Couche-Tard
item.description: 魁北克公共养老金管理机构的一位高级管理人员表示，如果 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.【原文：A senior executive at Quebec’s public pension manager said the fund will likely provide financial backing to Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. if it moves ahead with a takeover bid for Seven & i Holdings Co., the parent of the 7-Eleven chain.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行 "很有可能 "在本月降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲中央银行 "很有可能 "在本月晚些时候举行的下一次会议上降息。【原文：The European Central Bank will “quite probably” cut interest rates at its next meeting later this month, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 美国就业数据刺激日元大跌后日本股市将跳涨
item.description: 上周五，由于美国就业报告强于预期，凸显了美国经济的韧性，日元兑美元汇率下跌，日本股市可能会上涨。【原文：Japanese stocks will likely advance after the yen slumped against the dollar on Friday on a stronger-than-expected jobs report that underscored the resilience of the US economy.】

item.title: 美国就业报告公布后，亚洲股市早盘上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在强劲的美国就业数据凸显了世界最大经济体的健康状况并提振了软着陆的希望之后，大多数亚洲股市将在早盘交易中高开高走。【原文：Most Asian stocks are set to open higher in early trading after strong US jobs data underscored the health of the world’s largest economy and boosted soft landing hopes.】

item.title: 石油下跌，交易商关注以色列对伊朗袭击的反应
item.description: 本周石油开盘走低，因为交易商权衡了以色列对伊朗上周的导弹袭击可能采取的报复行动，美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）不鼓励对德黑兰的原油田进行打击。【原文：Oil opened the week lower as traders weighed Israel’s potential retaliation against Iran for a missile attack last week, with President Joe Biden discouraging a strike on Tehran’s crude fields.】

item.title: 力拓确认已与钒锂公司接洽收购事宜
item.description: 世界第二大矿业公司力拓集团（Rio Tinto Plc）证实，该公司已向锂矿商 Arcadium Lithium Plc 公司提出了价值 33 亿美元的非约束性收购方案。【原文：The world’s second largest miner Rio Tinto Plc confirmed it has made a non-binding takeover approach for $3.3 billion lithium miner Arcadium Lithium Plc.】

item.title: 富时指数改革引发韩国和印度债券市场关注
item.description: 韩国为将其债券纳入主要的富时罗素指数而做了各种努力，而印度则对公共改革避而不谈；但印度在全球投资者中的受欢迎程度可能会使其在加入相关基准方面占得先机。【原文：South Korea has ticked every box in an attempt to get its bonds included in a major FTSE Russell index, while India has steered clear of public overhauls — but the latter’s popularity with global investors may give it an edge to join a related benchmark.】

item.title: 100%"收益率助推新的快速ETF零售热潮
item.description:

Amateur investors are plunging into the complex world of derivatives-powered ETFs that can dangle huge payouts riding big-name stocks, among other goodies. Industry pros and regulators urge caution.

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 在中东冲突升级、乌克兰战争、恶劣天气和供应链瓶颈的推动下，大宗商品一路飙升。黄金的涨势使得用金条购买布伦特原油变得更加便宜。巴西玉米收成面临的风险也推高了谷物价格。【原文：Commodities are soaring, fueled by escalating conflict in the Middle East, war in Ukraine, wild weather and supply chain bottlenecks. Gold’s rally has made buying Brent with bullion cheaper. And risks to Brazil’s corn crop are driving up prices of the grain.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势加剧，两年来石油市场看涨程度最高

item.title: 就业意外后债券交易员为 "不着陆 "做好准备
item.description: 近几个月来，"不着陆 "情景--即美国经济持续增长、通胀重燃、美联储几乎没有降息空间--作为债券市场的谈资已基本消失。【原文：The “no landing” scenario – a situation where the US economy keeps growing, inflation reignites and the Federal Reserve has little room to cut interest rates – had largely disappeared as a bond-market talking point in recent months.】

item.title: 中国股市的 "恐慌性购买 "对加密货币中交易量最大的代币造成影响
item.description: 衡量加密货币需求的最佳指标之一表明，一些中国投资者正在从数字资产转向中国飙升的股票市场。【原文：One of the best measures for gauging demand for cryptocurrencies suggests that some Chinese investors are shifting away from digital assets and back to the nation’s surging stock market.】

item.title: 德国商报》称蒂森克虏伯可能放弃绿色钢铁项目
item.description:
《德国商报》援引内部文件报道称，蒂森克虏伯正在对其绿色钢铁项目计划进行审查，该计划可能会导致项目最终被取消。【原文：

Thyssenkrupp is carrying out a review of its plans for a green steel project that may lead to its eventual cancellation, Handelsblatt reported, citing internal documents.

】

item.title: 图片报》称大众汽车首席执行官预见到中国报复性关税的威胁
item.description: 据《图片报》（Bild am Sonntag）报道，大众汽车公司首席执行官奥利弗-布卢姆（Oliver Blume）在为中国政府可能采取的报复行动做准备时，希望能找到一种替代方案来解决对中国电动汽车征收关税的问题。【原文：Volkswagen AG Chief Executive Officer Oliver Blume hopes for an alternative solution to tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles as he braces for potential retaliation from Beijing, Bild am Sonntag reported.】

item.title: S&P公司的8万亿美元涨势将面临棘手财报季的考验
item.description: 在股市经历了今年的火爆开局之后，交易员们正面临着一系列风险，从经济担忧到利率不确定性，再到选举焦虑。但本周，股票能否继续上涨的最重要变量或许又将成为焦点：企业盈利。【原文：Traders are staring down a series of risks after the stock market’s torrid start to the year, from economic fear, to interest rate uncertainty, to election angst. But perhaps the most important variable for whether equities can keep rolling returns to the spotlight this week: corporate earnings.】

item.title: 苹果逐渐放弃年度产品发布策略
item.description: 苹果公司正在逐步放弃每年一次的产品升级周期，此举可能会使产品发布更加频繁，减少令人不安的延迟。另外：苹果公司下一代产品的发布时间，包括 Apple Intelligence。【原文：Apple is inching away from its annual product upgrade cycle, a move that could lead to more frequent releases and fewer jarring delays. Also: A look at when the company’s next products are coming out, including Apple Intelligence.】

item.title: 飓风海伦过后，佛罗里达州面临致命热带威胁
item.description: 热带风暴 "米尔顿 "有可能演变成一场大飓风，袭击包括坦帕在内的佛罗里达州墨西哥湾沿岸地区，可能造成数十亿美元的损失，给这个不到两周前还在遭受 "海伦 "袭击的州和地区带来更多苦难。【原文：Tropical Storm Milton is threatening to grow into a major hurricane aimed at Florida’s Gulf Coast including Tampa, potentially causing billions of dollars in damage and heaping more misery on a state and region still reeling from Helene less than two weeks ago.】

item.title: 以色列在 10 月 7 日里程碑之前加强加沙和黎巴嫩行动
item.description: 在哈马斯于 10 月 7 日发动致命袭击一周年纪念日的前一天，以色列正陷入一场没有明确结局的多线战争，它向加沙北部派兵，并在黎巴嫩保持密集的空袭和有限的地面机动。【原文：A day before it marks a year since the deadly Oct. 7 attacks by Hamas, Israel is locked into a multi-front war with no clear end, sending troops back to northern Gaza and keeping up intense aerial attacks and a limited ground maneuver in Lebanon.】

item.title: 中国股市怀疑论愈演愈烈，傲视全球的势头仍在延续
item.description: 中国股市振奋世界的涨势未能说服许多全球基金经理和策略师。【原文：The world-beating rally in Chinese stocks is failing to convince many global fund managers and strategists.】
